summary: This document is a Federal Bureau of Prisons inmate roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York dated August 1, 2019, listing hundreds of inmates with their details. It is followed by several prisoner remand forms (BP-S377) for specific individuals, including one for Jeffrey Epstein, remanding him to custody as a material witness on February 4, 2019. This document is a collection of U.S. Marshals Service and Federal Bureau of Prisons forms dated August 1, 2019, primarily consisting of prisoner remand orders and transfer receipts for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. It details the intake, transfer, and release of numerous federal prisoners, including one held as a material witness. The documents also include a roster and a release authorization form.

events.title: Epstein Remanded as Material Witness
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is formally remanded to the custody of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC)/Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) by a U.S. Marshal, listed as a material witness.

events.title: MCC New York Inmate Roster Snapshot
events.description: A Bureau of Prisons generalized retrieval produces a population monitoring census/roster for the MCC New York facility, listing hundreds of inmates with their registration numbers, names, admission dates, and housing locations.

events.title: Prisoner Delivery Order
events.description: A U.S. Marshal issues a Prisoner Remand or Order to Deliver for prisoners Yiran Tavares-Brito and Karliek Williams to be delivered to MCC New York.

events.title: Prisoner Remands and Transfers at MCC New York
events.description: Multiple U.S. Marshals Service prisoner remand orders and Bureau of Prisons transfer receipts document the intake, transfer, and release of numerous federal prisoners at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

events.title: Release from Special Housing Unit
events.description: A memorandum authorizes the release of four inmates (Rolando Darand, Mark Gouldbourne, Ramel Jackson, Luigi Jaquez) from the Special Housing Unit at MCC New York for reasons including completed disciplinary segregation and UDC sanctions.

events.title: Furlough Transfer of Ronnish Gupta
events.description: A release authorization form certifies the furlough transfer of inmate Ronnish Gupta from MCC New York.

events.title: Release Authorization Prepared
events.description: The release authorization form for inmate Ronnish Gupta is dated July 21, 2019, for an August 1, 2019 release.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
MCC/MDCs (Metropolitan Correctional Center / Metropolitan Detention Centers)
MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
Bronx CCC, 2532-2534 Creston Avenue, Bronx, NY 10468
keyFacts: A Bureau of Prisons inmate roster dated August 1, 2019, lists hundreds of inmates at MCC New York, indicating the facility's population.
A prisoner remand form (BP-S377.058) shows Jeffrey Epstein was remanded to custody on February 4, 2019, with the charge category listed as 'Material Witness'.
Epstein's remand form lists his register number as 76318-054 and his housing unit as 'K04N K04-129L' on the roster.
The document includes multiple blank or partially completed remand forms, suggesting a standard template for processing prisoners into BOP custody.
A separate 'Prisoner Remand or Order to Deliver' form orders the delivery of two other inmates (Tavares-Brito and Williams) to MCC New York on August 1, 2019.
The documents are dated August 1, 2019, and pertain to routine prisoner management operations at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

One prisoner, Jose Martinez (Reg. No. 85976-054), is explicitly listed with charges of 'CIVIL CONTEMPT' and 'MATERIAL WITNESS', indicating a potential connection to a legal proceeding requiring testimony.
A memorandum details the release of four inmates from the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at MCC New York, citing reasons such as completed disciplinary segregation and no pending incident reports.
A separate release authorization form documents the furlough transfer of inmate Ronnish Gupta from MCC New York to another location.
Multiple standard forms (USM-40, BP-5377) are used, showing the procedural handling of prisoner intake, custody transfers, and releases by the U.S. Marshals Service and Federal Bureau of Prisons.
